item.title: Congress Just Increased Deficits By $4 Trillion, And All I Got Was 2.9% Tax Increase
item.description:
You’ll need a scorecard to keep up with the insanity in Washington this week.
The Senate’s been a lost cause for a while, so let’s not even bother with the upper house. Besides, it’s really hard to focus on good fiscal policy while Hooter’s Girls are passing out Bacardi 151 shots, Buffalo wings, and “Welcome 2013” horns in the cloak room. Over in the House, things looked interesting for a while.

item.title: Don’t Expect Boehner To Play The Black Knight
item.description:
The GOP didn’t really have a plan in place in case it lost. It certainly didn’t have a plan for getting snotclobbered. And if you try to spin Tuesday’s results as anything less than a good old-fashioned ass-kicking, you’re deluding yourself.
**Republicans Got Creamed ** I know Michelle Malkin found 20 things that went right on election night, but there about 60 million things that went wrong. Let’s take a look:
